locations.name: Emily's Bedroom
locations.description: Modern San Francisco apartment bedroom with minimalist aesthetic. Queen-size bed with gray duvet and white sheets. IKEA-style furniture in light wood tones. Several small potted plants (succulents, pothos). Desk with monitor in corner for work-from-home setup. Full-length mirror. Hardwood floors with cozy area rug. Blackout curtains on window.

lighting_conditions.early_morning: dim with phone light, blackout curtains blocking most light
lighting_conditions.morning: soft natural light filtering through curtains

variations: wide shot showing bed and desk

locations.prompt_template: anime illustration, masterpiece, modern minimalist apartment bedroom, queen-size bed, gray duvet, white sheets, IKEA furniture, light wood, small potted plants, succulents, desk with monitor, full-length mirror, hardwood floors, area rug, blackout curtains, San Francisco apartment, young professional aesthetic, detailed interior
locations.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, low quality, cluttered, messy, old furniture, dark room, small room, child's room

locations.name: Emily's Apartment Bathroom
locations.description: Shared apartment bathroom, clean and organized. White tile floor and walls. Single vanity with mirror and good lighting. Glass-enclosed shower. Organized toiletry caddy on counter. Skincare products neatly arranged. Towels on rack. Small window or vent. Modern but not luxury apartment style.
locations.prompt_template: anime illustration, masterpiece, modern apartment bathroom, white tile floor, white tile walls, single vanity, mirror with lighting, glass shower enclosure, organized toiletries, skincare products, towel rack, clean minimalist style, San Francisco apartment bathroom, detailed interior
locations.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, low quality, dirty, old, luxury bathroom, bathtub, double vanity, large bathroom

ip_adapter_strength.notes: Maintain clean modern apartment bathroom feel

locations.name: Emily's Apartment Kitchen
locations.description: Open-concept apartment kitchen connected to living area. Modern white cabinets with simple hardware. Gas stove and standard appliances. Small breakfast bar with two stools. Drip coffee maker on counter. Good natural light from window. Some plants on windowsill. Shared cooking space with roommate's items visible.

lighting_conditions.morning: bright natural light through window, overhead light on

locations.prompt_template: anime illustration, masterpiece, modern apartment kitchen, open concept, white cabinets, gas stove, stainless steel appliances, breakfast bar, two stools, drip coffee maker, window with plants, natural light, San Francisco apartment kitchen, young professional home, detailed interior
locations.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, low quality, old kitchen, cramped, dark, dirty, luxury kitchen, large kitchen, island

ip_adapter_strength.notes: Maintain modern urban apartment kitchen feel

generation_settings.model: Animagine XL 3.1 or equivalent anime SDXL model
generation_settings.notes: Generate 3 reference images per location with slight angle variations

usage_instructions.step_1: Generate location reference images using prompts above
usage_instructions.step_2: Review and select best images for each location
usage_instructions.step_4: Use selected references with IP-Adapter during scene generation
usage_instructions.step_5: Maintain consistency by using same references for all scenes in that location

notes.rationale: Faster iteration, focus on San Francisco apartment aesthetic for young tech professional
notes.cultural_elements: Modern minimalist style, plants, shared living space, urban apartment life
notes.character_home_style: Young professional renter, IKEA-style furniture, organized but lived-in
